ModMetaData.name: Beerophage
ModMetaData.author: Roman
ModMetaData.description:
Introducing Beerophage, a mod that adds alcohol-consuming xenotypes to RimWorld. These beings have evolved to subsist on fermented beverages instead of blood, creating unique gameplay mechanics around brewing, alcohol management, and intoxication-based abilities.
Summary of Features:
- New Xenotypes: Experience beer-loving creatures with unique abilities tied to alcohol consumption - Alcohol Management: Beerophages require various alcoholic beverages for sustenance and special abilities - Brewing Dependencies: Enhanced interaction with brewing and fermentation mechanics - Intoxication Abilities: Special powers activated through alcohol consumption - Tolerance System: Manage alcohol tolerance and dependency mechanics
Transform your colony with these alcohol-dependent beings and master the art of brewing to keep your Beerophages thriving!
